name: alchemilla
description: server, client concurrently use this package.json

scripts.server:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon -x node --no-warnings --experimental-specifier-resolution=node --loader ts-node/esm server/src/main.ts --watch server/src
scripts.server:esm: nodemon -r esm --experimental-specifier-resolution=node -r dotenv/config --watch server/src --exec ts-node server/src/main.ts
scripts.test: concurrently "npm run dev" "npm run server" "npm run codegen"

author: lynn
